content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5) and a chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when setting research
- Ensure the technology is valid and exists before attempting to set research
### Errors when inserting items
- Make sure the item exists in the inventory before attempting to insert
- Ensure the lab has enough space to insert the item
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the entity has the item to extract before attempting extraction
### Errors when using prototypes
- Ensure the prototype exists and is correctly named before attempting to use it
### Errors with fuel
- Ensure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate before attempting to mine
### Errors with chest space
- Ensure the chest has enough space to hold items before attempting to insert items into it
